mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock_daily_charge( STOCK_CODE, STOCK_NAME, ZUI_XIN_JIA, ZHANG_DIE_E, ZHANG_DIE_FU, ZOU_SHOU, JIN_KAI, ZUI_GAO_JIA, ZUI_DI_JIA, CHENG_JIAO_LIANG, CHENG_JIAO_E, ZIN_JI_JIN_LIU_RU, HUAN_SHOU_LV, REPORT_TIME, ADD_DATE ) VALUES( #{STOCK_CODE}, #{STOCK_NAME}, #{ZUI_XIN_JIA}, #{ZHANG_DIE_E}, #{ZHANG_DIE_FU}, #{ZOU_SHOU}, #{JIN_KAI}, #{ZUI_GAO_JIA}, #{ZUI_DI_JIA}, #{CHENG_JIAO_LIANG}, #{CHENG_JIAO_E}, #{ZIN_JI_JIN_LIU_RU}, #{HUAN_SHOU_LV}, #{REPORT_TIME}, #{ADD_DATE} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE STOCK_CODE = VALUES(STOCK_CODE)
